Posts.Content: katherineH wrote: Hi, My name is Kathy and I never in a million yrs thought I would be "posting" on any board, but I need you gals!!! . I've just recently been diagnosed with BC, and I'm scared to death!!.  I've finished my radiation.  I did the new MammoSite targeted radiation. It was for 5 days,twice a day.I'm wating to start my chemo next week. I've heard that the side effects are hard to live with. I don't for sure which chemo drugs i'll be taking--- guess i'll talk that over with my Dr. next week--I just want to get it started and get it over with. katherineH Dx 2/12/2009, IDC, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 0/0 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Wating to start Chemo katherineH katherineH

Posts.Content: May 18, 2009 12:38AM katherineH wrote: Thank you Gitane for getting back with me and the encouragement. I'm not sure how to use this board yet but i'm sure i'll figure it out. I had my port put in last week and I'm ready when the Dr. is ready. I've been reading a lot of information and have found it to be really helpful. I would like to work while I'm on chemo, but my Dr. said she would prefer that I not because of the risk for infections but I think I will see how the first treatment goes. Once again--- thanks for the encouragement.
Posts.Title: Wating to start Chemo katherineH katherineH
